name: chayote
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical fruit shaped like a pear, with green skin and white flesh, that is usually cooked and eaten as a vegetable: Market tables were piled high with cabbages, kohlrabi, and chayote. Slice and stir-fry a chayote and an onion.
Sarawuth123/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
